trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a solid color.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un'area con un colore a tinta unita.

trans-unit.source: For convenience, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> class provides a set of commonly used SolidColorBrush objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per praticità, la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>classe fornisce un set di oggetti SolidColorBrush usati comunemente, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the SolidColorBrush class provides several special features: SolidColorBrush objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Funzionalità dell'oggetto Freezable:** perché eredita dal <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>(classe), la classe SolidColorBrush fornisce diverse funzionalità speciali: SolidColorBrush oggetti è possibile dichiarati come, condivisi tra più oggetti, in sola lettura per migliorare le prestazioni, clonare e resi thread-safe.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle diverse funzionalità fornite da <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>degli oggetti, vedere il [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *predefinedBrushName* The name of a brush defined by the class, such as or .
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` # # valori XAML *predefinedBrushName* il nome di un pennello definito dalla classe, ad esempio o .

trans-unit.source: *rgb* A three-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *RGB* un numero esadecimale di tre cifre che descrive questo pennello <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: La prima cifra specifica il colore <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valore, la seconda cifra specifica il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valore e la terza cifra specifica il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `00F`.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, `00F`

trans-unit.source: *argb* A four-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *ARGB* un numero esadecimale a quattro cifre che descrive questo pennello <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: La prima cifra specifica il colore <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>valore, la seconda cifra specifica relativa <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valore, la cifra successiva specifica il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valore e l'ultimo carattere specifica relativa <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `F00F`.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, `F00F`

trans-unit.source: *rrggbb* A six-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *RRGGBB* un numero esadecimale a sei cifre che descrive questo pennello <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Le prime due cifre specificano il colore <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valore, le due successive relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valore, e quella finale relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, `0000FF`

trans-unit.source: *aarrggbb* An eight-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *aarrggbb* un numero esadecimale a otto cifre che descrive questo pennello <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Le prime due cifre specificano il colore <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>valore, le due successive relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>valore, le due successive relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>valore, e quella finale relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `FF0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, `FF0000FF`

trans-unit.source: *scA* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scA* <xref:System.Single> il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>valore di questo pennello <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scR* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scR* <xref:System.Single> il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>valore di questo pennello <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scG* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scG* <xref:System.Single> il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>valore di questo pennello <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scB* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scB* <xref:System.Single> il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>valore di questo pennello <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> </xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] profilo colori.</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The alpha channel color value.
trans-unit.target: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> il valore del colore del canale alfa.</xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: L'intervallo di valori è compreso tra 0.0 e 1.0.

trans-unit.source: *colorValue* A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
trans-unit.target: *colorValue* un elenco delimitato da virgole dei valori di tre a otto che rappresentano i canali di colore del profilo colori.

trans-unit.source: The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: L'intervallo di valori è compreso tra 0.0 e 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with no color or animations.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> classe senza colori o animazioni.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> classe con l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The color to apply to the fill.
trans-unit.target: Il colore da applicare per il riempimento.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, questo metodo copia delle associazioni dati e dei riferimenti di risorsa (), ma non possono risolvere non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> era di proprietà<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> oggetto, eseguendo copie complete dei valori correnti di tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti alle risorse, data binding e le animazioni non vengono copiate, ma i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>oggetto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Un clone modificabile dell'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto clonato <> </> *> proprietà sarà <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> anche se l'origine <> </> *> proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore di questa <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors> class.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di colori predefiniti, vedere la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>

trans-unit.source: For a list of system colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors> class.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di colori di sistema, vedere la <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>classe.</xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The brush's color.
trans-unit.target: Il colore del pennello.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors.Transparent*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro supporta il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dell'infrastruttura e non deve essere utilizzato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: The binary reader to read the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: Il reader binario per leggere il <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref> da.

trans-unit.source: The deserialized <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Deserializzato <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>.
